medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain was sudden in onset and nonradiating. He had one episode of emesis yesterday with intermittent nausea. He reports episodes of RUQ and epigastric pain in the past, mostly after eating heavy meals, especially eggs. His pain has resolved since administration of pain medicine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Psoriasis. Past surgical history includes right inguinal hernia repair.
medical_history.family_history: No history of biliary or liver disease.
